special_abilities.name: Keen Smell.
descriptions: Blagothkus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: Blagothkus can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
* Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, prestidigitation
* 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, magic missile, shield
* 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, misty step, shatter

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.

actions.name: Morningstar.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.
